title: Touch Button tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to generate a touch button on your device.

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Moves the following components to the workspace

the **Touched** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/touchbutton/button.png)

and the **event** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/touchbutton/event.png)

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/Log.png) on the sidebar,

move the **print** component

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/print.png)

and put the text component in the print component as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/touchbutton/log.png)

this is to display on the console whether the button is being touched or not

Now add the event component as in the image below, this component allows us to be aware of when the button is pressed or not pressed.

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/touchbutton/blocks.png)
